title: AI见闻 2019-08-16 星期五
content:
【机器学习】
1）属性可解释的推荐系统
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jVw6NRPD5SFBT8Q9pQlItQ
2）关于机器学习的知识点，全在这篇文章里了
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jcVcuvnpIDfC1kz2Dzu6OQ
3）关于互信息的思考 Mutual Information: Formal Limitations
http://artem.sobolev.name/posts/2019-08-14-thoughts-on-mutual-information-formal-limitations.html

【深度学习】
1）JAXnet - Neural nets in JAX
https://github.com/JuliusKunze/jaxnet
2）timeserio - Better keras models for time series and beyond
https://github.com/octoenergy/timeserio
3）Rectified Adam (RAdam) 优化器解析
http://www.weibo.com/1402400261/I2rEOj5UN

【计算机视觉】
1）彻底解决梯度爆炸问题，新方法不用反向传播也能训练ResNet
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jT6WU-XlcvP-n428oWyHQQ
2）从CelebA获取高分辨率人脸图像
https://github.com/LynnHo/HD-CelebA-Cropper
3）ICCV2019 可选择性与不变性：关注边界的显著性目标检测
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ntSH2aS4YHqrLaTAfWFLsQ
4）这些老照片如何用算法修复？
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/610zA258Nh49Pz3EAhoXbg

【自然语言处理】
1）从ACL2019看NLP未来发展趋势
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/yabWIFX89dNGEZwv0gUYgw
2）笨办法学AllenNLP
https://jbarrow.ai/allennlp-the-hard-way-0/
3）AI同传效果媲美人类，百度翻译出品全球首个上下文感知机器同传模型
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Bkxm7m6Zx4HOu02fpBTWzw

【arXiv PrePrint】
1）HyperKG: Hyperbolic Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Knowledge Base Completion
https://deepai.org/publication/hyperkg-hyperbolic-knowledge-graph-embeddings-for-knowledge-base-completion
2）Exploiting semi-supervised training through a dropout regularization in end-to-end speech recognition
https://deepai.org/publication/exploiting-semi-supervised-training-through-a-dropout-regularization-in-end-to-end-speech-recognition
